sentences.english: Phoenix the pray to the god, please forgive the sin of her father.
sentences.chinese: 凤英向天父祷告，请天父赦免她的罪。

sentences.english: Phoenix the pray to the god, please forgive the sin of her father.
sentences.chinese: 凤英向天父祷告，请天父赦免她的罪。

sentences.english: Christ would ascend to heaven, and pray the Father to send the Comforter, the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣升上高天，求天父上帝，赐下圣灵保惠师。

sentences.english: For whoever does the will of myFather in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.
sentences.chinese: 凡遵行我天父旨意的人，就是我的弟兄姐妹和母亲了。

sentences.english: All things happen according to God's fatherly providence.
sentences.chinese: 所有的事物都按着神天父般的眷护而发生。

sentences.english: Oh!Then leave me, merciful father, as I am.
sentences.chinese: 那么仁慈的天父，你就让我保持原样吧。

sentences.english: Our Father, which art in heaven, hallowed be Thy name.
sentences.chinese: 哦，天父，天上的真神，愿尊祢名为圣。

sentences.english: But my Father is calling now and I have to go home.
sentences.chinese: 但是我的天父来接我，我必须回家。
这是天父世界，小鸟长翅飞鸣。

sentences.english: From God our heavenly Father a blessed angel came.
sentences.chinese: 哦，天父，天上的真神，愿尊祢名为圣。

sentences.english: To prepare for an attack by raiders, Kardaine prays to the Father to inspire courage.
sentences.chinese: 为了抵御掠袭者攻击，卡典向天父祈祷让他鼓起勇气。

sentences.english: How does our Abba Father show His love to us ?
sentences.chinese: 天父如何向我们显明他的圣爱？

sentences.english: Up in heaven is the holy God.
sentences.chinese: 处在高天之上的是圣洁的天父。

sentences.english: Forgive me God for I have sinned , help me find my way.
sentences.chinese: 天父，请宽恕我的罪孽，请助我找到正确的方向。

sentences.english: Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father;
sentences.chinese: 你信实何广大，我神我天父。

sentences.english: Then leave me, merciful father, as I am.
sentences.chinese: 那么仁慈的天父，你就让我保持原样吧。

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
Abba (Aramaic word father)/by ext. God the Father in Christian gospel
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
memorial tablet in a temple commemorating a deceased father
